Package com.gisgraphy.webapp.action

Class Summary
BaseAction Implementation of ActionSupport that contains convenience methods for subclasses.
DateConverter  
DisplayFeatureAction DisplayFeature Action
FileUploadAction Sample action that shows how to do file upload with Struts 2.
FulltextSearchAction fulltext search Action
GeolocSearchAction geoloc search Action
ImportAction Action that do the all import
ImportConfirmAction Action that retrieve the configuration and
PasswordHintAction Action class to send password hints to registered users.
ReloadAction This class is used to reload the drop-downs initialized in the StartupListener.
ResetImportAction Action that reset the import.
SearchAction base class for Gisgraphy search Action
SignupAction Action to allow new users to sign up.
StatsAction stats Action
UserAction Action for facilitating User Management feature.
